description: This file defines CSS styles and variables for theming and layout management of a Tic Tac Toe frontend application.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with styles for layout and theming.

classes.name: game-title
classes.description: Styles for the title of the game.

classes.name: game-board
classes.description: Styles for the game board layout.

classes.name: square
classes.description: Styles for each square on the game board.

classes.name: game-status
classes.description: Styles for displaying the current game status.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button.
